generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, with people walking on the right side.
- building: Multiple buildings line the right side of the street, with windows and commercial storefronts.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the left side of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Two individuals are walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked or driving on the road, including a silver car on the right and a white car on the left.
- bus: A red tram (a type of rail vehicle for public transport) is visible on the left side of the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at intersections, including one green light above the road.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign indicating a right turn is visible on the left side of the road.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- terrain: A grassy hill or embankment is visible in the background on the left side of the road.
